info.title: Dive EA REST API
info.description: Dive Experience Amplifier REST API provides a set of services which leverage obtaining catalog and TV grid info, contextual items (cards) information and saving and a static (scene by scene) version of the card carousel for linear TV and video on demand

post.description: The token endpoint is used to obtain access tokens which allow clients to make API requests

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: Grant type used to obtain the token.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: Device identifier, must uniquely identify the user or device accessing the API. Required only for "device_credentials" grant type

parameters.name: refresh_token
parameters.description: Refresh token, used to issue a new token without resending client credentials. Required only for "refresh_token" grant type

get.description: Checks whether a list of client movie identifiers (Video On Demand) are available to be synchronized using the Dive API

parameters.name: client_movie_id_list
parameters.description: List of client movie IDs, provided as a comma separated list

get.description: Retrieves a movie's full card by its client ID, including catalog and cast information

source.name: TMDb
source.disclaimer: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

data.text: Leonard volunteers to sign for a package in an attempt to make a good impression on Penny, but when he enlists Sheldon for help, his attempt at chivalry goes terribly awry.

source.name: TMDb
source.disclaimer: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

data.value: Chuck Lorre Productions and Warner Bros. Television
Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Robert Cohen and David Goetsch

get.description: Retrieves the current list of cards related to the given movie scene
Retrieves full card detail, including catalog and cast information, for the content currently being broadcasted on the channel

source.name: TMDb
source.disclaimer: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

data.text: Leonard volunteers to sign for a package in an attempt to make a good impression on Penny, but when he enlists Sheldon for help, his attempt at chivalry goes terribly awry.

data.value: Chuck Lorre Productions and Warner Bros. Television

404.description: Channel Not Found or no content currently available

get.description: Returns the current and upcoming grid of TV events for the given channel

source.name: TMDb
source.disclaimer: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

source.name: TMDb
source.disclaimer: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

get.description: Checks if a list of client channel identifiers are currently broadcasting synchronizable content

parameters.name: channel_id_list
parameters.description: List of client channel IDs as a comma separated list

get.description: Retrieves the list of cards related to the content currently being broadcasted in the given channel

404.description: Channel Not Found or no content currently available

get.description: Retrieves a full card detail, with no relations or context

application/json.title: Oyster Bay
application/json.subtitle: 39 Chestnut Hill Drive, Oyster Bay, Nueva York, Estados Unidos

data.text: Oyster Bay es un pueblo ubicado en el condado de Nassau en el estado estadounidense de Nueva York. En el año 2000 tenía una población de 293.925 habitantes y una densidad poblacional de 1,087.3 personas por km². Oyster Bay es uno de los tres pueblos del condado, junto con North Hempstead y Hempstead.

get.description: Retrieves a full card detail, and its relations to other cards in a given context (card version)

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version identifier, indicates the context where the card is being requested

application/json.title: Oyster Bay
application/json.subtitle: 39 Chestnut Hill Drive, Oyster Bay, Nueva York, Estados Unidos

data.text: Oyster Bay es un pueblo ubicado en el condado de Nassau en el estado estadounidense de Nueva York. En el año 2000 tenía una población de 293.925 habitantes y una densidad poblacional de 1,087.3 personas por km². Oyster Bay es uno de los tres pueblos del condado, junto con North Hempstead y Hempstead.

404.description: Card ID or card version Not Found

post.description: Stores a card under current user's likes list

delete.description: Removes a card from current user's likes list

get.description: Returns a paginated list of cards liked by current user

access_token.description: Auth token, must be included on every API request

refresh_token.description: Allows to issue new access tokens without resending client credentials

ready.description: True if movie can be synchronized via this API, False otherwise.
True if channel is broadcasting synchronizable content, False otherwise

broadcast.description: List of TV events currently being broadcasted

channel_id.description: TV channel ID where the the event is schedulled

start_date.description: TV event start date in milliseconds since EPOCH

end_date.description: TV event end date in milliseconds since EPOCH

Card.description: Basic Dive data unit, represents an item of a given category

version.description: Card version for a given movie and scene

has_content.description: Indicates if the card has additional browsable content

products.description: Commercial products associated to the card

user.description: Contains user interaction attributes relative to this card

is_liked.description: Indicates if user has liked the card or not

ImageData.description: Linked image URL and additional information

SourceData.description: Information regarding the source of any API item

CardContainer.description: Card static data container. It's content depends on the 'type' parameter value and is represented by the schema of the same name

type.description: Card container format type, determines the format of the 'data' field

text.description: CardContainer composed by a block of text with an optional source attribution

listing.description: CardContainer composed by a list of pairs of label - value items

rating.description: CardContainer composed by a list of external ratings with source attribution

map.description: CardContainer composed by a map of a given location

latitude.description: Value of the location latitude, in decimal format degrees

longitude.description: Value of the location longitude, in decimal format degrees

zoom.description: Zoom value, defines the height coordinate over the given location

link.description: CardContainer composed by a list of links to external media resources with source attribution

image.description: CardContainer composed by a list of images with source attribution

awards.description: CardContainer composed by a list of awards with nominees and winners

catalog.description: CardContainer composed by additional information of a catalog item (movie, serie or chapter)

background_image.description: URL of an additional background image for this catalog element

genres.description: List of genres of this catalog entry

runtime.description: Length of the movie or chapter, or average length of serie chapters, in minutes

chapter_index.description: Index of the chapter inside its season (only for content_type=chapter)

season_index.description: Index of the season where the chapter belongs (only for content_type=chapter)

sync.description: Dive interactive capabilities of this catalog item

is_synchronizable.description: Indicates if this catalog item can be synchronized

creators.description: Comma separated list of season creators

year.description: Year of production of this season

chapter_index.description: Index of the chapter inside this season

is_up_to_date.description: Indicates if product in up to date on Dive database

is_exact.description: Indicates if product is an exact match

country.description: Country information. Only for travel products

region.description: Region information. Only for travel products

city.description: City information. Only for travel products

address.description: Address information. Only for travel products

postal_code.description: Postal code information. Only for travel products

rating.description: Rating information. Only for travel products

RelationModule.description: Relation modules provide lists of cards related to the current one. It's contents depend on the module 'type' attribute

type.description: Relation module type, defines the contained data structure

single.description: List of related single cards. The relation type is defined by the module content type

content_type.description: Single module content type, defines what kind of relations are contained in the module

duple.description: List of related pairs of cards, each pair having a relationship type between both cards

content_type.description: Duple module content type, defines what kind of relations are contained in the module

rel_type.description: Indicates the relationship between the pair of cards (from > rel_type > to)

ProductsFlag.name: products
ProductsFlag.description: Indicates if cards should contain commercial products when available (true) or not (false)

UserDataFlag.name: user_data
UserDataFlag.description: Indicates if cards should contain user data when available (true) or not (false)

RelationsFlag.name: relations
RelationsFlag.description: Indicates if cards should contain the scene hierarchy (true) or not (false)

ImageSize.name: image_size
ImageSize.description: Size of the images returned in the response
